metadata.summary: Configure LimaCharlie to output events and detections to Google Cloud Storage buckets, including integration with Google Chronicle
metadata.primary_use_case: Archive LimaCharlie telemetry to GCS for Chronicle integration or custom analytics workflows

extracted_apis.description: Output events and detections to GCS bucket with service account authentication
